import React, { useState } from "react"; import ColorLogo from "../../Assets/Color logo.png"; import { Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import SignForm from "../Forms/SignForm"; const SignPage = () => { const [register, setRegister] = useState(false); return (
Track your expenses
Improve your finances
{register ? (

Welcome

Create an account with us

) : (

Welcome back

)}
); }; export default SignPage;
